snippet.title: Rolling Crash - (1979) - Arcade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Nichibutsu © 1979
[Coin-Op] Arcade Video Game
Emulator: MAME 0.215

Another variation of the popular Head-On game going around this year. This time you travel in a figure 8, and if you run into the opponent at an intersection, you don't explode - you just get knocked over to the side and continue on after that.  It's a nice touch and makes the game a little easier, as its challenging enough already.  The sound effects are just plain annoying, however, which is to be expected when this game was tacked on to the Space Invaders II motherboard, so it uses it's sounds.  Strange really.  But overall Head-On was just a way better, more fun to play game.
